markdownRemark.html:
• Divide and conquer. if you use a project management tool like Jira, you most probably get tasks on daily basis. Then it’s your role to divide them to smaller pieces that you can deliver each couple of days.
  • You ask team members to pull your changes to the shared, common branch. **Let’s polish that request. ** You can add descriptive information regarding what’s changed. If you work on view related software you may consider adding a print screen, gif or a short screen casted video (10–60 sec) which explains what you that pull/merge request does
  • Commit small pieces, let commits tell a compelling story of how they contribute to the final effect.

frontmatter.title: How to work remotely so that they love it
